channel.title: cross-validation on Researcher profile
channel.description: Recent content in cross-validation on Researcher profile

item.title: Reducing variance in importance-weighted cross-validation under covariate shift
Effects of sampling skewness of the importance-weighted risk estimator on model selection
Effects of sampling skewness in importance-weighted cross-validation
item.description: I presented my paper on how the importance-weighted risk estimator’s sampling distribution is skewed for small sample sizes, and how this affects hyperparameter selection during importance-weighted cross-validation under covariate shift.

item.title: On cross-validation under covariate shift
item.description: I presented my paper on problems with importance-weighted cross-validation under covariate shift.

item.title: On regularization parameter estimation under covariate shift
